title: The Legal Kiss
description: The Legal Kiss is an entertaining tour through civil societyâ€™s attempts to use law to control the act of kissing. The kiss has been used to transfer property, it has been prohibited as obscene in one famous movie, and it has been at the center of contracts, peace agreements and even manslaughter and murder. The Rule of Law and the kiss meet in this beautifully illustrated book making it a perfect gift book for anyone interested in the development of law and culture and the kiss.
author: Victoria Sutton
